profile.summary: Dr. Pregalathan Reddy is a distinguished Digital Education Researcher and Strategist with a PhD in Information Technology and over 15 years of experience leading Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) initiatives in higher education.
expertise: Human-AI collaboration in scholarship (The Centaur Scholar model)
Empirical analysis of LMS user adoption
Translating complex technical challenges into strategic, research-informed solutions

education.description: The development of a computerised simulation model to guide the South African higher education sector in short and long-term planning of TEL infrastructure
Six-week online course focused on all pedagogical aspects of online teaching
Development of a Language Learning Object Repository (LLOR) for second language teachers of English in Computer-Assisted Language Learning
Graduated with a distinction in Information Retrieval 4

responsibilities: Led a multidisciplinary team of academics and technicians to deliver strategic support and training for the Moodle LMS, serving a user base of over 35,000
Designed and executed institutional training programs on the pedagogical and ethical use of generative AI, directly informing current research on faculty development in ODeL contexts
Conducted empirical analysis of Moodle usage data to identify adoption trends and inform evidence-based system enhancements
Directed the technical management and strategic optimisation of the Moodle LMS, ensuring stability, security, and scalability for 35,000 users
Conducted ongoing national and international benchmarking of TEL infrastructure and practices to inform institutional strategy, directly contributing to PhD research
Led the research, testing, and integration of new educational technology plugins and tools, aligning technical capabilities with evolving pedagogical needs
Responsible for all aspects of development and maintenance of the online library system
Acquisition, cataloguing, indexing, classification, labelling, filing and lending
Performed scanning and cataloguing of new prints
Set up a web-based image database for printed photo library and a CMS for the intranet using Plone
Responsible for the training of academics in the use of the (WebCT) learning management system
Development of online classroom content, including web design from beginner to advanced levels

pedagogical: AI in Education (The Centaur Scholar Model)
